todos.title: Twilio integration
todos.content: Create new note via SMS. Support text, audio, links, and media.

todos.title: Audio recording in note
todos.content: Show audio in a note and playback UI

todos.title: Bookmark in note
todos.content: Show rich link UI in a note, and feature to render website screenshot.

todos.title: Image viewer
todos.content: Opens when clicking on the thumbnail in the list or on the image in the note

todos.title: Mobile view
todos.content: Functions for both web responsive and native apps. Note: Android and iOS will need unique share icons.

todos.title: Desktop view
todos.content: PWA for website and native apps. Note: Windows and Mac will need unique share icons.

todos.title: Formatting options
todos.content: Mobile formatting bar expands and collapses when tapping the format icon.

todos.title: Audio recording
todos.content: Interface for when recording a new audio note

todos.title: Bookmarking
todos.content: Interface for when creating a new link note.

todos.title: Mobile home screen
todos.content: Folders, tags, and notes lists are sorted by recent.
